title: Where’s MVDP? Why Mathieu van der Poel has been happy off-radar at the Tour de France
content:
Van der Poel plays leadout-de-luxe to teammate Jasper Philipsen in evolution of personal and Alpecin-Deceuninck ambitions.

Read the full article at Where’s MVDP? Why Mathieu van der Poel has been happy off-radar at the Tour de France on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
